title: Kagi Bangs Schema
description: This schema defines the structure for bangs used by Kagi Search

s.title: Website Name
s.description: The name of the website associated with the bang.

d.title: Domain
d.description: The domain name of the website.

t.title: Trigger
t.description: The specific trigger word or phrase used to invoke the bang.

u.title: Template URL
u.description: The URL template to use when the bang is invoked, where `{{{s}}}` is replaced by the user's query.

c.title: Category
c.description: The category of the website, if applicable.

sc.title: Subcategory
sc.description: The subcategory of the website, if applicable.

fmt.title: Format
fmt.description: The format flags indicating how the query should be processed.
